com.milk.gui
Class AsEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.gui.AsEvent
public final class AsEvent
extends java.lang.Object

This class merely has utility methods to help deal with the AWT "feature" that you may only call some (many? most? all?) AWT methods from within the AWT event queue or face the dire consequences of difficult-to-debug deadlock problems. Java just sucks that way sometimes.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

runIn

public static void runIn(java.awt.Component component,
